Text: Thank's for the ul. but it dosen't work....tried compability mode 95,98 and without that, tried with the patch and without it. still dosen't work
when you extract the folder move the folder gta to program files try as compaibility mode as window xp sp2 i hope it will works
i run this game in xp and 7 works for me listen if you install dameon tools please uninstall it it will not work when you install dameon tools in pc
okey, i have windows xp SP3, and i don't have deamon tools but i have power iso
okey i got it to work, i just copied the "gta" folder to the program folder

1.Extract GTA 3 NEW YORK CITY EDITION 2011{FIESTA569}.zip to C:/Program Files/

2.Right click GTA3.exe and run in windows xp serpack2 mode, same with GTA3 neo mod.exe.

3. Create shortcut on desktop, and enjoy. :) 

hope this helps anyone that cant figure it out, btw great upload this game is sick :3
